movies.Title: The Lives of Others
movies.Actors: Martina Gedeck, Ulrich MÃ¼he, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur
movies.Plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

movies.Title: The Prestige
movies.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Priest (novel)
movies.Actors: Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo
movies.Plot: The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 17 nominations.

movies.Title: The Great Dictator
movies.Actors: Charles Chaplin, Jack Oakie, Reginald Gardiner, Henry Daniell
movies.Plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.

movies.Title: The Shining
movies.Writer: Stephen King (novel), Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Diane Johnson (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers
movies.Plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
